applications systems and databases Authorized to work in the US for any employer Work Experience SrNet Developer Thermo Fisher Scientific Rothgeb Dr MD December 2017 to Present Responsibilities Responsible for Analysis design developing and implementing of full software development life cycle Worked closely with the client team to design and develop the application according to the requirements using ASPNET with the business logic implemented using C Created WCF Service which is responsible for communicating and providing real time data from Database to Client Application Experienced supporting large scale applications in the production side Implemented application code using layered architecture Designed public webservices solutions and writing design documentation Implemented critical parts of solution and Code reviewed Published applications and database to Azure environment Managed resources assign activities and lead status meetings directly to the client Full development of project with ASPNet Devexpress HTML CSS and SQL Server Involved in all stages of application development life cycle SDLC including requirements design development implementation and support Created design in the Database where the company used to store sensitive information like credit cards expiration dates etc Provide technical architecture analysis design development and enhancement Design and created data access layer using LINQ and Entity Framework Worked with Azure SQL and Storage to manage all the sensitive information and user information Created Stored Procedures functions TSQL queries in the SQL server Created Proxy for WCF Test Client Application using Service Reference to test the WCF service by QA team Used Entity Framework for data retrieving querying and storage Designed Console Application which connects to the client FTP server and pulls the CSV files to our database after the proper validation Troubleshot the problems and fixed bugs through client requests and QA Participated in client meetings to discuss improvement options for the development of the application Environment C WCF Entity Framework HTML 5 CSS 3 ASPNET 4045 Visual removal adding and saving Designed and developed an application using Model View Controller MVC application framework Experience working with Team Foundation Server Used ASPNET MVC Page Controller pattern to add functionality to individual pages such as to accept input from the page request invoke the requested actions on the controller Coordinate with UX team to help them in designing the page Used Angular which communicated with a RESTful web service Developed Data Access Layer Using Entity Framework using Repository Aggregator and Faade Patterns to access data from Azure SQL and File storage also used API calls to enterprise API to get data in case of enterprise data Used CNET to develop Code for Business and Repository Layer Participated in various client meetings with the team to discuss improvements options during the development of the application Followed Agile Methodologies SCRUM KANBAN and Extreme Programming Maintained and designed databases with use of SQL server
